nodes.name: Schedule Trigger - Daily Analytics
nodes.notes: Trigger analytics collection daily at 6 AM (configurable via ANALYTICS_SCHEDULE)

nodes.name: Initialize Reporting Period
nodes.notes: Calculate date range for analytics collection

nodes.name: Collect Leads from HubSpot
nodes.notes: Fetch all leads created within reporting period

nodes.name: Collect Leads from Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Alternative: fetch leads from Google Sheets if not using CRM

nodes.name: Normalize Leads Data
nodes.notes: Merge and normalize leads from all sources

nodes.name: Collect Bookings from Cal.com
nodes.notes: Fetch all appointment bookings from Cal.com

nodes.name: Collect Bookings from Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Alternative: fetch bookings from Google Sheets

nodes.name: Normalize Bookings Data
nodes.notes: Merge and normalize bookings from all sources

nodes.name: Collect Payments from Stripe
nodes.notes: Fetch all payment transactions from Stripe

nodes.name: Collect Payments from Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Alternative: fetch payments from Google Sheets

nodes.name: Normalize Payments Data
nodes.notes: Merge and normalize payments from all sources

nodes.name: Collect NPS from Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Fetch NPS survey responses

nodes.name: Collect NPS from Typeform
nodes.notes: Alternative: fetch NPS from Typeform

nodes.name: Normalize NPS Data
nodes.notes: Merge and normalize NPS survey responses

nodes.name: Collect OCR Metrics from Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Fetch document processing metrics from OCR log

nodes.name: Normalize OCR Metrics
nodes.notes: Process and filter OCR performance metrics

nodes.name: Compute KPIs
nodes.notes: Calculate all key performance indicators

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate HTML report const data = $json; const brandName = $env.BRAND_NAME || 'Your Clinic'; const html = ` ${brandName} - Analytics Report

${brandName} Analytics Report

Period: ${data.period.label}

Generated: ${new Date().toLocaleString()}

ðŸ“Š Volume Metrics

Total Leads

${data.totals.leads}

Appointments Booked

${data.totals.bookings}

Completed Visits

${data.totals.completed_visits}

Total Revenue

$${data.totals.revenue_usd.toLocaleString()}USD

ðŸ“ˆ Conversion Funnel

Lead â†’ Booking

${(data.rates.lead_to_booking * 100).toFixed(1)}%

Booking â†’ Visit

${(data.rates.booking_to_visit * 100).toFixed(1)}%

Show Rate

${(data.rates.show_rate * 100).toFixed(1)}%

Retention Rate

${(data.rates.retention_rate * 100).toFixed(1)}%

ðŸ’° Revenue Metrics

Avg Revenue per Patient

$${data.averages.revenue_per_patient.toFixed(2)}

Total Payments

${data.totals.payments_count}

Visit â†’ Payment

${(data.rates.visit_to_payment * 100).toFixed(1)}%

ðŸ˜Š Patient Satisfaction (NPS)

Average NPS Score

${data.averages.nps_score.toFixed(1)}/10

Net Promoter Score

${data.averages.nps_net_score.toFixed(1)}

Total Responses

${data.totals.nps_responses}
Segment Count Percentage
ðŸŸ¢ Promoters (9-10) ${data.segments.promoters} ${data.totals.nps_responses > 0 ? ((data.segments.promoters / data.totals.nps_responses) * 100).toFixed(1) : 0}%
ðŸŸ¡ Passives (7-8) ${data.segments.passives} ${data.totals.nps_responses > 0 ? ((data.segments.passives / data.totals.nps_responses) * 100).toFixed(1) : 0}%
ðŸ”´ Detractors (0-6) ${data.segments.detractors} ${data.totals.nps_responses > 0 ? ((data.segments.detractors / data.totals.nps_responses) * 100).toFixed(1) : 0}%

ðŸ“„ Document Processing (OCR)

Documents Processed

${data.totals.documents_processed}

Avg Confidence Score

${(data.averages.ocr_confidence * 100).toFixed(1)}%

Avg Processing Time

${data.averages.doc_processing_time_sec.toFixed(1)}sec

ðŸ‘¥ Patient Engagement

Unique Patients

${data.segments.unique_patients}

Repeat Patients

${data.segments.repeat_patients}

No-Shows

${data.totals.no_shows}

Generated by Aigent Module 07 - Analytics & Reporting Dashboard

Data Sources: ${data.data_sources.join(', ')}

`; return { json: { ...data, report_html: html } };

nodes.name: Generate HTML Report
nodes.notes: Create formatted HTML analytics report

nodes.name: Check Report Format
nodes.notes: Determine output format: HTML, Markdown, or JSON

nodes.name: Upload Report to S3
nodes.notes: Store HTML report in S3 bucket

nodes.name: Upload Report to Google Drive
nodes.notes: Alternative: store report in Google Drive

nodes.name: Generate Report URL
nodes.notes: Create accessible URL for report

nodes.name: Check If Email Enabled
nodes.notes: Send report via email if EMAIL_REPORT_TO is configured

nodes.name: Send Report Email
nodes.notes: Email HTML report to configured recipients

nodes.name: Log Summary to Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Append summary metrics to historical log

nodes.name: Build aggregated_metrics.json
nodes.notes: Construct standardized output schema

nodes.name: Check If Looker Export Enabled
nodes.notes: Export to Looker Studio / Power BI if enabled

nodes.name: Export to Looker Studio
nodes.notes: Push metrics to Looker Studio dashboard

nodes.name: Return aggregated_metrics.json
nodes.notes: Return standardized analytics output

nodes.name: Error Handler
nodes.notes: Catch and format errors

nodes.name: Return Error Response
nodes.notes: Return error JSON with 500 status

main.node: Collect OCR Metrics from Google Sheets
